Analyst NAVIENT Fisher IN US June 2018 to Present Assist with various ThirdParty Risk Management program initiatives working closely with the ThirdParty Risk Management Leads Conducts onsite risk assessments based on agreed upon procedures guidelines Reviewed key vendorprovided documentation such as SSAE 18 TypeII report Act as remediation analyst to work with vendors in remediating findings discovered during the onsitevirtual assessment Experience with eGRC tools to ensure secure and prompt communication of findings and deployments of questionnaire to the vendor and to track vendor progress on remediation Carry out various types of vendor assessments such as onsite virtual risk assessment Working with the vendors to ensure risk discovered are remediated within reasonable time Ensure third party relationship adhere to companys policies procedures and compliant with regulatory guidelines and industry best practices Facilitated remediation for any thirdparty related operational issues as needed Assesses operational fitness of assigned third parties through due diligence reviews Provides ongoing monitoring for third party risk due diligence Performed continuous monitoring by assessing tools during onsite visits to validate the security questionnaires filled out by the vendors to ensure protection of data at the vendor sites 3rd Party Security Risk Analyst Wintrust Financial Corporation Chicago IL March 2017 to May 2018 Administer assessment questionnaires to our vendors Perform continuous monitoring by assessing tools during onsite visits to validate the security questionnaires filled out by the vendors to ensure protection of data at the vendor sites Conduct onsite and virtual risk assessments of our vendors based on agreed upon procedures guidelines Review key vendorprovided documentation such as SSAE 18 SOC2 TypeII report Review the access control managements such as physical and logical access on the vendor site Assess areas such as business continuity and disaster recovery PCI physical security system development operation access control incident management insider threat security policy Escalate issues of 3rd party vendors noncompliance to the vendor risk management office VMO Perform Data lost prevention analysis of our data at the vendor site Validate all controls at the vendor site to ensure there is confidentiality of our data in their custody Review all the security policies and procedures documentations provided by the vendor Working with the vendors to ensure findings discovered during the assessment are remediated within reasonable time based on the risk categories IT Audit Analyst Sears Holding May 2016 to February 2017 Performed audit of IT general and application controls information security systems development change management business continuity disaster recovery and computer operations Performed IT general controls testing for SarbanesOxley SOX 404 compliance and Service Organization Control SOC reports SSAE18 formerly SAS 70 Performed IT Infrastructure Audit to test default account vendor update patches password setting and unnecessary services running over the applications performed walkthroughs and detailed testing of controls to evaluate the design and operating effectiveness of controls Performed SSAE 16 SOC engagements by overseeing the identification of control objectives the assessment of risk planning and executing control testing and documentation of IT General Application and Process controls Performed testing of IT General and Application controls such as access control change management and IT infrastructures on all workstation and network Business Developer Standard Parking Chicago IL February 2015 to March 2016 Identify potential clients and the decision makers within the client organization make research and build relationships with new clients Meet with client decision makers for prospective investments decisions Works with team to develop proposals that speaks to the clients needs concerns and objectives Participate in negotiating solutionsservices Handle objections by clarifying emphasizing agreements and working through differences to a positive conclusion Professionally present new products and services without jeopardizing existing services Work with technical staff and other internal colleagues to meet customer needs
